80 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)); 81 } 82 83 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 84 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 85 PB_DS_LU_NAME(const PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) : 86 m_p_l(0) 87 { 88 __try 89 { 90 for (const_iterator it = other.begin(); it != other.end(); ++it) 91 { 92 entry_pointer p_l = allocate_new_entry(*it, 93 traits_base::m_no_throw_copies_indicator); 94 95 p_l->m_p_next = m_p_l; 96 m_p_l = p_l; 97 } 98 } 99 __catch(...) 100 { 101 deallocate_all(); 102 __throw_exception_again; 103 } 104 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 105 } 106 107 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 108 void 109 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 110 swap(PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC& other) 111 { 112 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 113 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID(other) 114 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ONLY(debug_base::swap(other);) 115 std::swap(m_p_l, other.m_p_l); 116 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 117 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID(other) 118 } 119 120 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 121 void 122 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 123 deallocate_all() 124 { 125 entry_pointer p_l = m_p_l; 126 while (p_l != 0) 127 { 128 entry_pointer p_next_l = p_l->m_p_next; 129 actual_erase_entry(p_l); 130 p_l = p_next_l; 131 } 132 m_p_l = 0; 133 } 134 135 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 136 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 137 ~PB_DS_LU_NAME() 138 { deallocate_all(); } 139 #endif
